mapper.select: SELECT LEDGER_IDX, DATE, ACCOUNT, CATEGORY, SUB_CATEGORY, DESCRIPTION, AMOUNT, ASSET FROM LEDGER WHERE USER_IDX = 1 ORDER BY DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LEDGER (USER_IDX, DATE, ACCOUNT, CATEGORY, SUB_CATEGORY, DESCRIPTION, AMOUNT, ASSET) VALUES (#{user_idx}, #{date}, #{account}, #{category}, #{sub_category}, #{description}, #{amount}, #{asset})
